description: Try our easy to follow Marinara Seafood Cakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Marinara Seafood Cakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add the remaining capers and cook for 3 minutes or until they burst into flowers. Transfer to a plate lined with paper towel. Cook seafood cakes, in batches, for 4 minutes each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a tray and cover to keep warm. Top with caper flowers. Serve with aioli, lemon wedges and green salad.

Serve with aioli, lemon wedges and green salad.
